title: Paved walking track, Fire Pit, Athletic facility with aerobics center
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1180 Sq.
Unwind at The Palmer, offering spacious one, two and three bedroom floor plans and newly renovated interior features.
Here you're close to historic Woodstock, shopping, golf, and minutes from downtown Atlanta.
Located in the highly rated Cherokee school district, with features like garages and garden baths.
There's a perfect home for you at The Palmer Apartments.

Built-in bookshelves, Double vanities in bathrooms, Comforting custom-home features, Dens, Oversized whirlpool and garden baths, Cozy gas & wood-burning fireplaces with charming mantles and slate hearths, Spa-like bathrooms feature, Private patio or balcony

Dog Park, Paved walking track, Fire Pit, Gated Community, Lit tennis courts with pavilion, Car Wash, Athletic facility with aerobics center, Playground, Redwood dry heat sauna, Garages available with remote access, Outdoor stainless steel grill, 2 picnic areas with grills and tables, Two dazzling swimming pools
